title: Basement Beauty
description: In the Scottish city of Glasgow a serial killer leaves a trail of victims like statues, while a group of assassins hunt for a rogue vampire who is kidnapping human women for his own perverted pleasure. In the midst of this Amalthea and her friends try to scratch a living while negotiating their way through everyday sexism and violence. Amalthea is afraid to walk home in the dark, but is she afraid enough? From the award winning author of The Starblood Trilogy, Carmilla Voiez.
author: Carmilla Voiez
